question: Are the games really free to play?
answer: Yes! All games are completely free to play, with no ads, creepy trackers, or hidden fees. We want to make gaming accessible and enjoyable for everyone.

question: Can I suggest a game idea?
answer: Absolutely! We love hearing from our community. Use the contact form to share your ideas.

question: Do I need an account to play?
answer: Nope. No accounts, logins, or personal data required. Just visit the site and start playing.

question: Why don't you use ads or trackers?
answer: We believe ads and trackers are intrusive. They slow down your experience, clutter the screen, and often involve selling user data to third parties. To protect your privacy and keep our site creep-free, we've opted for a donation model instead. We only use basic, anonymized analytics to improve the user experience and monitor site performance. No personal data is stored or shared.

question: How do you keep the site running?
answer: We rely entirely on donations and sponsorships to fund our studio. Every contribution helps us create more games and keep the site ad-free and tracking-free.

question: Can I get a refund for my donation?
answer: Donations are non-refundable, as they directly support our ongoing development and operational costs. We deeply appreciate your generosity!

question: Will there be subscription plans?
answer: We don't currently offer member subscriptions, but we're planning to introduce optional member tiers in the near future with exclusive perks. Stay tuned!

question: How do I contact you?
answer: Reach us via email at [contact@myol-creative.com](mailto:contact@myol-creative.com) or use the [contact form](https://wheat-fragrance-67b.notion.site/1a159febf5ad80f7ae72f153de397deb?pvs=105). We'll do our best to reply within 2-3 business days.

question: Can I sponsor your studio or collaborate?
answer: Yes! We're always open to partnerships. Email us at [contact@myol-creative.com](mailto:contact@myol-creative.com) to discuss opportunities.
